file_content.text: I knew Sergeant Kroan wouldn't leave us to die!
I owe you one. Best move out before those things return.
Thank you, Jedi. I knew someone would save us.
By the stars, I thought we were dead!
I'm sure glad to see you. I figured it was over for us.
Did the sergeant send you? I knew he wouldn't forget about us!
I figured we were done for. Thanks for coming after us.
